subject: Nutrition
title: Post-Workout Recovery Meals
description: A 60-second lesson on Post-Workout Recovery Meals.

hook.text: What you eat after training shapes recovery speed. The first 2 hours after exercise matter most.

buildup.text: Post-workout nutrition has two goals: refill glycogen with carbs and repair muscle with protein.

discovery.text: A 3:1 ratio of carbs to protein optimizes both glycogen refueling and muscle protein synthesis.

twist.text: Chocolate milk matches commercial recovery drinks in studiesâ€”same ratio, same results, fraction of the price.

climax.text: Recovery nutrition matters most when training twice daily. Single-session athletes have more flexibility.

punchline.text: Chocolate milk is a research-backed recovery drink.
